author: marekm3498
content:
very cool, thank you! 
<@543900561460822016> do you know if we plan to add consolidations for devnet 0?

author: lightclient
content: Right now we aren't planning to implement EL consolidations on devnet 0. My understanding is the functionality will exist in CLs so they can run the spec tests, but there will be no infra to create / include the consolidations in a beacon block.
